sourcesContent:
<ion-list>
  <ion-item>
    <ion-select aria-label="Alert Interface" placeholder="Região"
    (ionChange)="onEscolheRegiao($event)"
    (ionCancel)="pushLog('ionCancel fired')"
    (ionDismiss)="pushLog('ionDismiss fired')"
    >
      <ion-select-option value="CENTRO">Centro</ion-select-option>
      <ion-select-option value="NORTE">Norte</ion-select-option>
      <ion-select-option value="SUL">Sul</ion-select-option>
      <ion-select-option value="LESTE">Leste</ion-select-option>
      <ion-select-option value="OESTE">Oeste</ion-select-option>
      <ion-select-option value="TODOS">Todos</ion-select-option>
    </ion-select>
  </ion-item>
</ion-list>
